response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. This unique offering holds immense value to me, and I am confident it will do the same for you.

Considering its unparalleled quality and the impact it can have on your business or personal projects, I am extending an exclusive invitation to purchase this item at a special price tailored specifically for you. My proposed price for this remarkable product is $1,200,000.

This offer represents a significant discount compared to the market value, reflecting my desire to see this product in capable hands that can truly appreciate and benefit from its capabilities. I am hopeful that this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget, allowing us to move forward together in a mutually beneficial partnership.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or if there's anything else I can provide to help you make a decision. I am more than happy to discuss the specifics of the product further and answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
